summary:
Accredited Change Manager, project professional and operational leader, with experience in managing global teams across Customer Operations, Process Design and Change Management.
I thrive in both operational and project environments, organizing and collaborating with all the different stakeholders, able to speak the language of both business and technology. I have a passion for problem solving and connecting people with solutions, by actively driving a common understanding on the requirements, changes and solutions. My aim is to keep things simple, clear and visible in order to drive effective business solutions and ensure value realization.
